SummaryEnglish:
Simon is an adorable little rabbit who exudes all the vitality of childhood.

He's at an age when little rabbits (and indeed little children!) are starting to come into their own - challenging relationships with parents, embarking upon school life, learning about the world in general, dealing with authority and of course, language.

1.SummaryEnglish: While dressed like Super Rabbit, Simon tries to rescue Gaspard's blanket.

2.SummaryEnglish: Simon braves a ride on his bicycle without training wheels.

3.SummaryEnglish: Grandpa tells Simon and Gaspard all about the Tomato Elf.

4.TitleEnglish: I Don't Want To Go To The Pool
4.SummaryEnglish: Simon is worried about swimming in the pool with his class.

5.SummaryEnglish: An excited Simon and Gaspard get ready to celebrate Christmas.

6.TitleEnglish: I don't want to go to school

7.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard compete in a variety of games.

8.SummaryEnglish: A toothache sends Simon to the dentist.

9.TitleEnglish: The Teeny Weeny Incy Wincy Bugs
9.SummaryEnglish: Simon, Lou, Ferdinand and Mamadou play with bugs.

10.SummaryEnglish: Simon has a sled race with his friends.

12.SummaryEnglish: Simon and his little brother Gaspard take their first flight on an airplane.

13.SummaryEnglish: Gaspard wants to be with his big brother all the time.

14.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard can't figure out what their dad is up to.

15.SummaryEnglish: Simon stumbles upon an injured bird in his yard.

16.SummaryEnglish: Simon is bothered by his little brother's copycat ways.

17.SummaryEnglish: A new babysitter comes to take care of Simon and Gaspard.

18.SummaryEnglish: Simon, Gaspard and their dad prepare a big surprise for Mom's birthday.

19.SummaryEnglish: Simon wants to play Space, but Lou and Ferdinand would rather play something else.

21.SummaryEnglish: On a windy day, Simon and Gaspard help Ferdinand fly a kite.

22.SummaryEnglish: Simon's favorite toy car mysteriously goes missing.

23.SummaryEnglish: Simon, Gaspard and their friends join forces to make music.

24.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard are afraid to get their shots.

25.SummaryEnglish: Simon has a spare Chocosaurus toy to give away to a friend.

26.SummaryEnglish: Ferdinand drops Lou when she gets nits.

27.SummaryEnglish: Simon learns that being a big boy means helping with chores.

28.TitleEnglish: I am not your friend anymore
28.SummaryEnglish: Simon doesn't like his friends laughing when he falls over.

29.SummaryEnglish: Simon has a sleepover at Ferdinand's house.

30.SummaryEnglish: Simon tries to prove that he can do anything Dad can do.

31.SummaryEnglish: Simon tells his friends that he has a dragon in his yard.

32.SummaryEnglish: Simon tries extra hard to make a new friend of a visitor.

33.SummaryEnglish: Simon makes up his own rules during a game of hide and seek.

34.SummaryEnglish: Cousin Benjamin doesn't want to play with Simon and Gaspard.

35.SummaryEnglish: Simon and his friends are to perform in their school play.

36.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard take an adventure-filled trip to the beach.

37.SummaryEnglish: Simon wants to play soccer with older kids.

38.TitleEnglish: But We Don't Want To Leave
38.SummaryEnglish: After a superfun trip, Simon and Gaspard don't want to leave their grandparents' house.

39.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Lou build a snowman in the backyard.

40.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Lou try to keep Gaspard away from the new remote control car.

41.SummaryEnglish: Simon has trouble waiting for his dad to play soccer with him.

43.SummaryEnglish: The power goes out just as Simon and Gaspard are getting ready for bed.

45.SummaryEnglish: Simon goes camping with his family.

46.SummaryEnglish: Simon finds a hermit crab in a pretty shell on the beach.

47.SummaryEnglish: While dressed as Super Rabbit, Simon offers to help out his friends.

49.SummaryEnglish: Simon and his friend Ferdinand trade toys and cards with each other.

50.SummaryEnglish: Gaspard puts Simon through the paces as Super Big Brother.

51.SummaryEnglish: Simon really wants to spend the night in his treehouse.

1.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard play superheroes, challenging each other to find out who is the strongest superhero in the world: Is it SuperRabbit or Captain Rabbit?

2.SummaryEnglish: Very early in the morning, Simon is awoken. Rise and shine!, it's a big day today, you boys are going on vacation! The whole family has a long car ride. And they have to hurry so they'll reach the port in time for the boat, which will take them to Grandpa and Grandma's.

3.SummaryEnglish: Simon accidentally draws all over the wall - what a big mess!

4.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard are at Grandpa and Grandma's house. Grandma tells them a surprise is in store, and Simon can't wait to find out what it is!

5.SummaryEnglish: While Mummy is building a galaxy mobile in the workshop, Simon and Gaspard go on a mission to collect some stars for it!

6.TitleEnglish: I Am Not Afraid of the Storm
6.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard have made themselves a cabin in the attic.  Grandma is finishing up reading them a bedtime story.  Come kids, time for bed now!  But once in his bed, Simon doesn't want to sleep. He'd rather play around with his flashlight and make Gaspard laugh. Suddenly, a storm erupts. Gaspard is scared, Simon tries to reassure him but he loses his flashlight in the process. Simon finally finds it but Gaspard still wants to go see Grandma and Grandpa! Their journey through the house begins in the pitch-dark...

7.SummaryEnglish: Simon goes to the pool for a swimming lesson. Mommy and Gaspard accompany him. While they wait for him to finish his lesson, they go play in the wading pool. Though he is excited at the beginning of his lesson, Simon quickly changes his mind.  Because before he can use the big water slide, he has to warm up and do a super complicated exercise. Pffff, this is way too hard. And to think that meanwhile, Gaspard is having so much fun in the wading pool with Mommy!

8.SummaryEnglish: This morning at Grandpa and Grandma's, there’s lots of fog. Simon and Gaspard have just woken up and they go bug-eyed:  they have the impression that they're in a cloud! But while they're having fun in the fog, the children stumble on a cow walking around the yard.  Grandma knows it well, it's Roussette, she often gets lost. What they have to do now is take her back to the farm!

9.TitleEnglish: You Did It On Purpose, Gaspard
9.SummaryEnglish: At the beach, Gaspard does one goof-up after another. He wants to play with Simon but each time he turns out to be a real pain in the neck. He tangles up the string to the kite, makes his brother fall in the water after pushing him on the inflatable ducky-life-preserver...and finally, the cherry on the cake: Simon has built awesome sand castles with Maelle and Gaspard shows up, smashing the tower on one of them and totally destroying the other castle... Simon is an adorable little rabbit who’s surrounded by loving family and close friends - he has a little brother called Gaspard and his parents, Eva and André. His close friends, Lou and Ferdinand love playing together for hours and hours. They sometimes quarrel, as friends do, but it never lasts long…

10.SummaryEnglish: In the park, Simon and Gaspard are playing tag but quickly end up in an argument instead - will they be able to work things out?

11.SummaryEnglish: Ferdinand tricks Gaspard into thinking he can get new toys from a magical tree.

12.SummaryEnglish: Simon is building a castle with Ferdinand but Gaspard clumsily breaks it. Ah, pffft, what a baby! Since it's lunch time, Ferdinand goes home to eat. Simon is impatient for him to come back after lunch. But when he learns that Gaspard is having a few of his  friends over, Simon flips out:  ahhhh no, a whole bunch of babies who are going to break all of my toys!

13.SummaryEnglish: Simon goes to the pool for a swimming lesson.

14.SummaryEnglish: Simon finds himself caught between two secrets he has to keep!

15.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard find a skateboard at the park - but will they be able to share it?

16.SummaryEnglish: The beach club has organized a potato sack race. Maelle asks Simon if he wants to race with her. Yessss! Gaspard also wants to take part in the race but he’s too small. Simon and Maelle go off to practice as two bigger kids watch and laugh at them, convinced that they don’t stand a chance against two big guys like them. And indeed, it’s not easy to move forward and not fall down...

17.SummaryEnglish: Simon, Ferdinand and Gaspard are playing in the park when Gaspard keeps losing his glider, but Gaspard is too shy to ask people if he can have it back, so he asks Simon for help.

18.SummaryEnglish: Simon sets out to prove that he can do things all by himself, just like a big boy!

19.SummaryEnglish: Ferdinand, Simon and Gaspard compete to see who's the best at doing stuff.

20.TitleEnglish: The Fastest T-Shirt In The World
20.SummaryEnglish: A foot race is going to take place at school tomorrow. Ferdinand is convinced that he is going to win. This bugs Simon big-time because he is just as convinced he will win. After all, Simon is the fastest! Especially if he is wearing his “fastest t-shirt in the world”, the one with the lightning bolt on it! He puts it on at home that evening and sure enough, he does everything super-duper fast. But the next morning at school, Simon realizes that his fetish t-shirt isn’t in his bag...

21.TitleEnglish: A Trip in the Breakdown Truck
21.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard are super impatient to go pick up the newspaper in the village with Grandpa. That’s because they are going to be able to sit in the motorcycle side-car. Awwwwesome!  And especially because they are also going to be able to buy candy. What could be cooler?!  Unfortunately, the side-car stalls on their way into town...

22.TitleEnglish: I Want to Ride On the Tractor
22.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard have gone to visit the farm in Grandpa’s side-car. They wait for him while he goes off to get some eggs and while’s he’s gone they become obsessed by the tractor that is parked next to them.

23.SummaryEnglish: It's bedtime, but Simon just can't get to sleep!

24.SummaryEnglish: It’s Lou’s birthday. At school the day before, Simon overhears her saying that the present that she has always dreamed of is a rainbow-colored-butterfly-unicorn-kitty!  Of course they don’ exist but Simon is determined to make one for her with some help from Mom. What a wonderful birthday present to offer Lou! It turns out perfectly, it’s beautiful and boy is she going to be happy!  Simon and Mommy take the bus to go to Lou’s birthday party.  But Simon is distracted by the old woman sitting next to him and he forgets his precious present in the bus...

25.SummaryEnglish: While playing hide and seek, Simon overhears Daddy and Mommy talking about a surprise. Is it a present?! Super curious, he and Gaspard decide to search everywhere in the house to find the surprise. But their search is in vain. Ah, maybe it’s in Daddy’s workshop? The yard is covered in snow so they put on their snowsuits and run off to the workshop. But since Daddy is there, Simon pretends that they just came to get the sled. A few minutes later, Daddy exits the workshop with a big, somewhat damaged box...

26.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard are super impatient to go pick up the newspaper in the village with Grandpa. That’s because they are going to be able to sit in the motorcycle side-car. Awwwwesome!  And especially because they are also going to be able to buy candy. What could be cooler?!  Unfortunately, the side-car stalls on their way into town...

28.TitleEnglish: There's no such thing as monsters

48.TitleEnglish: I don't want to go on stage

2.SummaryEnglish: Simon a appris à faire du cerf volant avec son grand-père et il bat un grand. Vexé le grand le challenge avec un autre défi, mais cette fois c’est plus dur ! Heureusement Papi n’est pas loin !

3.SummaryEnglish:
Simon, Ferdinand et Gaspard se déguisent en pompiers et jouent avec le jet d’eau dans le jardin.
Mais pompiers c’est un métier ! Nos trois apprentis ont encore à apprendre !

4.SummaryEnglish:
Chez Papi et Mamie, Maman apprend à Simon et Gaspard qu’elle avait caché un trésor dans le jardin quand elle était petite.
Simon et Gaspard vont ils retrouver le trésor de leur maman grâce à la carte retrouvée au grenier ?

5.SummaryEnglish:
Après une histoire de dragons racontée par sa grand-mère, Gaspard n’arrive pas à s’endormir, il fait des cauchemars.
Il communique sa peur à Simon. Et si les dragons existaient vraiment ? C’est ce qu’on va voir !

6.SummaryEnglish:
Papa s’est bloqué le dos !
Simon et Gaspard prennnent la maison en main et décident de tout faire à la place de Papa avant que Maman ne rentre du bureau.
Merci les petits lapins !

7.TitleEnglish: Il n’a peur de rien Papa
7.SummaryEnglish: Simon s’est mis en tête de faire peur à Papa, car ce n’est pas possible même si Papa est très fort, qu’il n’ait peur de rien ! Qui sait ?!

8.SummaryEnglish:
Simon dort chez Ferdinand. Il a envie de faire pipi pendant la nuit et ne réussit pas à réveiller Ferdinand.
Va t’il retrouver les toilettes dans le noir ?

17.TitleEnglish: Le premier qui rigole a perdu

20.TitleEnglish: Elle est trop forte Super Lou !

23.TitleEnglish: La méga soupe de super bananes

38.TitleEnglish: Mais si, tu es un super héro

41.TitleEnglish: C'est pas moi qui fait le monstre

49.SummaryEnglish: For Christmas, Simon has asked for a space vessel but in the end, he decides what he'd really like is a new ball. Will he reach the post office in time to send a new letter to Santa?

52.TitleEnglish: On a inventé un super jeu

1.SummaryEnglish: Gaspard drops his blankie in the stream that runs through the park by mistake!

2.SummaryEnglish: Wow, Candy is very good! And even though Simon, Gaspard and Lou have promised mommy that they won't take any more, they tiptoe back into the kitchen to look for the candy jar. But it has disappeared! The children begin imagining that it's Professor Wolf who has taken it!

12.TitleEnglish: Our Secret Base is in Danger

22.SummaryEnglish: Super Rabbit and Captain Rabbit team up with Super Elvis to stop a bad guy.

23.SummaryEnglish: It's super cold at home - the radiators have broken down! While Mum and Dad are calling the repair guy, Simon and Gaspard imagine that a bad guy is trying to turn them all into icicles!

24.SummaryEnglish: Grandpa sends Simon and Gaspard to pick strawberries, but there are way too many to pick! What if they could pick them at supersonic speed?

25.SummaryEnglish: The Super Rabbit gang have a superhero super-football game!

26.SummaryEnglish: Mum is scrubbing Gaspard and Simon's heads with shampoo. They have lice everywhere! Where in the world are all these lice coming from?

27.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard let a chicken escape the coop, and it's up to the Super Rabbit gang to get it back!

28.SummaryEnglish: Ferdinand is upset when his friends won't listen to his ideas.

29.SummaryEnglish: The Super Rabbit gang have a mission to find their parents' missing keys, but Captain Rabbit is strangely reluctant...

30.SummaryEnglish: Super Ferdi must overcome his fear of slimy things to save a snail.

31.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard want to go swimming, but there's too many jellyfish about!

32.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Ferdinand must learn to work together to find their skateboard.

33.SummaryEnglish: Super Rabbit and Captain Rabbit must save three kidnapped frogs!

34.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Lou try to play basketball, but the hoop is way too high!

35.SummaryEnglish: Stuck inside because of a storm, the Super Rabbit gang decide to find who's responsible!

36.SummaryEnglish: A bird is trying to steal Grandpa's strawberry seeds!

37.SummaryEnglish: Lou's costume goes missing... right before she's due to go on stage!

38.SummaryEnglish: The gang teach Captain Rabbit to fly his mega spaceship!

39.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard try to catch a crab to show Grandpa and Grandma.

40.SummaryEnglish: The super rabbit gang must stop Professor Wolf from freezing all the animals!

41.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard have a funny faces challenge.

42.TitleEnglish: A Super Cake for Super Heroes
42.SummaryEnglish: After Gaspard's sand cake is ruined, it's up to the gang to make a new super hero cake!

43.TitleEnglish: The Mega Robot Who Knows It All
43.SummaryEnglish: The gang need the help of a super robot to help Gaspard learn to count!

44.TitleEnglish: On the Hunt for Mega Snails
44.SummaryEnglish: Super Rabbit and Captain Rabbit compete to see who can find the most snails!

45.SummaryEnglish: Simon and Gaspard must win their mega marble back from Ferdinand.

46.SummaryEnglish: To conquer Lou's fear of falling, the Super Rabbit gang practice obstacle courses.

47.SummaryEnglish: Lou and Ferdinand can't stop arguing after a game of marbles.

48.SummaryEnglish: Ferdinand loses his fancy new watch and it's up to Super Rabbit to help him find it!

49.SummaryEnglish: Simon can't bring himself to tell Ferdinand he broke his truck.

50.SummaryEnglish: It's up to the Super Rabbit gang to clean up the beach!
